text: niyata vasayenma pratiksepa kota janaya venuven ehi rÃ¦ndi sitinnanhata ha pitastarayanhata samana lesin api pat kala suddha vu masjidayen ha allahge margayen valakvannan da (ema danduvamata bhajanaya vanu Ã¦ta.) tavada kavareku saparadhi lesin ehi kelasimata sitanne da vedaniya danduvamakin bhukti vindinnata api ohuta salasvamu
